mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, name, phone, email, zipcode, addr, reg_date, role) values( AES_ENCRYPT(#{id}, #{aesKey}), SHA2(#{password}, 512), AES_ENCRYPT(#{name}, #{aesKey}), AES_ENCRYPT(#{phone}, #{aesKey}), AES_ENCRYPT(#{email}, #{aesKey}), AES_ENCRYPT(#{zipcode}, #{aesKey}), AES_ENCRYPT(#{addr}, #{aesKey}), now(), #{role})
